page.title: 14My Hobbies
page.content: One of my hobbies is collecting badges. I have 52 badges my favourite being a metal badge with a bird on it with Liverpool Football Club sign. I have been collecting for a year now. I go to castles, beaches and other places like that to buy them. Some badges I send off for, 4 badges I got from joining a club. I also enjoy football. I am one of the best in my school. Our team colours are blue top and blue shorts. Our team has only beaten 2 other teams, they are Dunsford and Spreyton Primary Schools. I also like BMX-ing, a BMX is a tough bike that you do stunts on. I have had it for a year now and I can do some clever tricks on it. By Adrian Eley, age 11
